title: Japanese Voice actors on english client, possible?
body: I've been a fan of the voice actors for japanese udyr and project jhin, would it be against terms of service to change them to their Japanese counterparts?

replies.body: Yes, you can just change the locales file and set it to read only so it wont get changed back by an update, that lets you set different languages and regions.
